title: HNP Ignition - LF coach
body:
HNP ignition is currently seeking a dedicated coach to work with the team and improve macro play over all.

We are an organisation looking to enter OCS 2017 and hope that you will stay with the team for that journey

Please keep in mind this is not paid work (if we do gain sponsorships later on this can change).

If intrested please add "HNP Dawg" or "Silkenfawn" in game to discuss further. 

-Hnp dawg (Owner of HNP eSports)
